title: Nova Crawler

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Once per game, you may attack a player during the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If you die, your two highest and lowest neighbors become a Nova Crawler (5227) of their alignment.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See to it that less than three nova crawlers exist in the graveyard by the end of the game.

desc:
Post 5227
*"Warning, breach in sub-level 3 detected. Initiate security protocol 1-1-5."*
